name: Alice Wonderland
bio: Curiouser and curiouser. Full-stack developer with a passion for AI and community building. Loves a good cup of tea.

name: Bob The Builder
bio: Can we fix it? Yes, we can! Frontend specialist focusing on accessible and performant UIs. Enjoys woodworking and open-source.

name: Charlie Brown
bio: Good grief! UX designer and aspiring cartoonist. Believes in simple solutions to complex problems. Often found flying kites.

name: Diana Prince
bio: Champion of truth and justice. Backend engineer specializing in distributed systems and cloud infrastructure. Also an archaeologist.

name: Edward Scissorhands
bio: Creative soul with a unique perspective. Data scientist and artist. Prefers quiet environments and topiary.
